scenario_1.persona_desc: A site member who enjoys solving math puzzles and is interested in adding fractions. They may also be a teacher or a tutor who regularly uses math puzzles to enhance their students' learning.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, regardless of what the other person receives. Both options give me $400, so I will pick the one that also gives the other person more money. However, since the payoff for me is the same in both scenarios, and I have no information about the other player, I will choose the left option, which promotes equality.
